with.numeric-gamify-exp: (let .properties as $p in (if $p and $p.gamify_exp then $p.gamify_exp = int($p.gamify_exp | match("^\\s*([+-]?[0-9]+)\\s*|\\(\\s*([+-]?[0-9]+)\\s+[+-]?[0-9]+\\s*\\)$") as $m | $m[1] or $m[2]) else $p)); .
with.gamify-category: (let .properties as $p in (if $p and $p.gamify_exp then $p[$category_property] = (if $p.gamify_exp < 10 then "simple" elif $p.gamify_exp >= 20 then "hard" else "regular") else $p[$category_property] = "regular")); .
